summary: a small follower mod containing 4 followers including my previous mod Anna
descriptionHtml:
reqiures: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22598/?
========================================================
contains Anna: breton spellsword
xanthe: nord warrior
keira: breton mage
lilly: imperial thief/assassin (note: im changing her face in the next update)
they are found in the sleeping giant inn in riverwood.
========================================================
im working on releasing a version that dosn't require oblivhairs
========================================================
any texture bugs report them as there may be some had to deal with a few before release.
========================================================
they may vary with the bodymods or skin textures installed on your skyrim.
these were SG female texture renewal: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35267/?
CBBE: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?
========================================================
pictures wre taken with dynavision
imaginator
4k texures
amidianborn book of silence
========================================================
thanks to Radioragae and dragonage7 for oblivion hair pack
author: 8bitonion
